cu.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and prevent proper log output initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting the PUSCH antenna ports to an invalid value of 99 will cause antenna configuration errors and prevent proper uplink transmission setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 PUSCH 天線埠數設定為無效值 99 會導致天線配置錯誤，並阻止正確的上行鏈路傳輸設定。
